conditions.name: Migraine Variant 1
conditions.suggestion: Rest in a dark, quiet room and take prescribed medications. Recommended medicines: Sumatriptan (50mg), Naproxen (500mg), Ondansetron (4mg).

conditions.name: Influenza Variant 2
conditions.suggestion: Rest and take prescribed antivirals if needed. Recommended medicines: Oseltamivir (75mg), Ibuprofen (400mg), Paracetamol (500mg).

conditions.name: Common Cold Variant 5
conditions.suggestion: Rest, stay hydrated, and take over-the-counter medications. Recommended medicines: Acetaminophen (500mg), Cetirizine (10mg), Dextromethorphan (15mg).

conditions.name: Acute Bronchitis
conditions.suggestion: Rest, use humidifier, and take prescribed medications. Recommended medicines: Guaifenesin (400mg), Dextromethorphan (30mg), Ibuprofen (400mg).

conditions.name: Seasonal Allergies
conditions.suggestion: Avoid allergens, take antihistamines. Recommended medicines: Cetirizine (10mg), Loratadine (10mg), Nasal spray.

conditions.name: Gastroenteritis
conditions.suggestion: Stay hydrated, rest, follow BRAT diet. Recommended medicines: Ondansetron (4mg), Loperamide (2mg), ORS.

conditions.name: Tension Headache
conditions.suggestion: Rest, stress management, gentle massage. Recommended medicines: Acetaminophen (500mg), Ibuprofen (400mg).

conditions.name: Acute Sinusitis
conditions.suggestion: Steam inhalation, nasal irrigation. Recommended medicines: Pseudoephedrine (60mg), Amoxicillin if bacterial.

conditions.name: Acid Reflux
conditions.suggestion: Avoid trigger foods, eat smaller meals. Recommended medicines: Omeprazole (20mg), Antacids, H2 blockers.

conditions.name: Urinary Tract Infection
conditions.suggestion: Increase fluid intake, antibiotics needed. Recommended medicines: Nitrofurantoin (100mg), Phenazopyridine (200mg).

conditions.name: Anxiety Attack
conditions.suggestion: Deep breathing, grounding techniques. Recommended medicines: Alprazolam (0.25mg) if prescribed, seek counseling.

conditions.name: Food Poisoning
conditions.suggestion: Stay hydrated, rest, bland diet. Recommended medicines: Ondansetron (4mg), Loperamide (2mg), ORS.

conditions.name: Cluster Headache
conditions.suggestion: Oxygen therapy, stay calm. Recommended medicines: Sumatriptan injection, Verapamil (120mg).

conditions.name: Pneumonia
conditions.suggestion: Immediate medical attention needed. Recommended medicines: Antibiotics as prescribed, antipyretics.

conditions.name: Vertigo
conditions.suggestion: Rest, avoid sudden movements. Recommended medicines: Meclizine (25mg), Diazepam if severe.

conditions.name: Conjunctivitis
conditions.suggestion: Eye hygiene, avoid touching. Recommended medicines: Antibiotic eye drops if bacterial, artificial tears.

conditions.name: Asthma Attack
conditions.suggestion: Use rescue inhaler, stay calm. Recommended medicines: Albuterol inhaler, seek emergency if severe.

conditions.name: Kidney Stone
conditions.suggestion: Stay hydrated, pain management. Recommended medicines: Tamsulosin (0.4mg), strong pain relievers.

conditions.name: Chronic Tension Headache
conditions.suggestion: Rest, stress management. Recommended medicines: Acetaminophen (500mg), Ibuprofen (400mg), Muscle relaxants.

conditions.name: Bacterial Sinusitis
conditions.suggestion: Antibiotics needed, nasal care. Recommended medicines: Amoxicillin (500mg), Decongestants, Nasal steroids.

conditions.name: GERD Type 1
conditions.suggestion: Diet modification, elevate head. Recommended medicines: Omeprazole (40mg), Famotidine (20mg).

conditions.name: Lower UTI
conditions.suggestion: Antibiotics, hydration. Recommended medicines: Nitrofurantoin (100mg), Phenazopyridine (200mg).

conditions.name: Panic Attack
conditions.suggestion: Breathing exercises, grounding. Recommended medicines: Alprazolam (0.5mg) if prescribed, therapy.

conditions.name: Bacterial Food Poisoning
conditions.suggestion: Medical attention, hydration. Recommended medicines: Ciprofloxacin (500mg), Ondansetron (8mg).

conditions.name: Episodic Cluster Headache
conditions.suggestion: Oxygen therapy, prevention. Recommended medicines: Sumatriptan injection, Verapamil (240mg).

conditions.name: Bacterial Pneumonia
conditions.suggestion: Hospitalization may be needed. Recommended medicines: Levofloxacin (750mg), Oxygen therapy.

conditions.name: Benign Paroxysmal Positional Vertigo
conditions.suggestion: Epley maneuver, vestibular therapy. Recommended medicines: Meclizine (25mg), Diazepam (2mg).

conditions.name: Bacterial Conjunctivitis
conditions.suggestion: Antibiotic treatment needed. Recommended medicines: Erythromycin eye ointment, Artificial tears.

conditions.name: Severe Asthma Attack
conditions.suggestion: Immediate emergency care needed. Recommended medicines: Multiple Albuterol treatments, Prednisone.

conditions.name: Obstructing Kidney Stone
conditions.suggestion: Emergency treatment needed. Recommended medicines: Morphine, Tamsulosin (0.4mg), IV fluids.

conditions.name: Migraine with Aura
conditions.suggestion: Dark quiet room, preventive care. Recommended medicines: Rizatriptan (10mg), Antiemetics.

conditions.name: Acute Appendicitis
conditions.suggestion: Immediate surgical evaluation. Recommended medicines: IV antibiotics, Pain management.

conditions.name: Diabetic Ketoacidosis
conditions.suggestion: Immediate hospitalization needed. Recommended medicines: IV insulin, Fluid replacement.
